name: Midnights Great Halloween Party
description:
A cute little game for the coming of Halloween. 

Play as Midnight, a black cat as she goes around and gathers everything she needs for her amazing Halloween party in this simple but fun Bitsy game that is sure to entertain. 

The purpose of this project was to have something simple and fun for the player fitting with the Halloween theme and playing around with the dialogue and text in the Bitsy format and would love to expand on the concept at a later time

All made in the Bitsy by Claire Alves
